Line.text: *Sigh* How long have I been here?
Three days? A week?
Nevertheless, I'm almost out of supplies...
Although there was a sealed box in the warehouse.
I doubt anyone would get mad at a stranded guy checking up a box to see if there's any supplies, right?
Huh? A plastic christmas tree and a bunch of christmas decorations?!
Why not make this ice prison a little more fun and cozy with these damn decorations, huh?
Here we go, a christmas tree...
Should I put up decorations outside as well?
As if I had anything else to do though...
Well... Doesn't look that bad, honestly
I wonder how much power's left in the batteries before everything goes dark for good, though.
Almost out, huh? So... is that all?
I could live a bit longer if I had additional oxygen tanks and my generatior hasn't broken in the crash.
And I ended up with a christmas tree instead. What a joke.
Screw that.
I'm taking this damn tree outside.
If I am to die, then at least this bloody plastic tree will turn my snow-white icy grave into a christmas snow-white icy grave.
That's more like it!
Well, what a metamorphosis, huh?
I gave my life for this planet to come a bit more alive.
